xwikidoc.content:
platform.panels.applications.helper=Ovdje možete odabrati koje aplikacije su dostupne u traci aplikacija (zadano na lijevoj strani). Tamo će biti prikazana bilo koja nova aplikacija. Ako neke od njih želite ukloniti, samo trebate povući i ispustiti ikonu iz prve kućice u drugu. Također možete po vašoj želji promijeniti poredak aplikacija. Ne zaboravite spremiti vaše izmjene\! platform.panels.applications.displayedapps=Aplikacije u traci platform.panels.applications.blacklistedapps=Aplikacije koje nisu u traci platform.panels.applications.save=Spremi platform.panels.applications.revert=Ponovo postavi platform.panels.applications.ajax.success=Konfiguracija je spremljena. platform.panels.applications.ajax.csrf=CSRF validacija nije uspjela. Pokušajte ponovo učitati stranicu. platform.panels.applications.ajax.noright=Nemate ovlast za uređivanje PanelsCode.ApplicationsPanelConfiguration. platform.panels.applications.ajax.error=Spremanje vaše izmjene nije uspjelo. admin.panels.applications=Panel aplikacija admin.panels.applications.description=Upravljajte s prikazom aplikacija u panelu aplikacija.
### Missing: admin.panels.navigation=Navigation Panel ### Missing: admin.panels.navigation.description=Manage what pages are displayed in the Navigation Panel. ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_excludeTopLevelExtensionPages=Exclude Top Level Extension Pages ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_excludeTopLevelExtensionPages.hint=This dynamic filter removes from the navigation tree the top level pages that belong to an installed extension, if they are not meant to be modified. ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_exclusions=Exclusions ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_exclusions.hint=The list of pages to exclude from the navigation tree. ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_inclusions=Inclusions ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_inclusions.hint=The list of pages to include in the navigation tree even if they were excluded by a previous filter. ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.excludedPages=Excluded Pages ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.excludedPages.hint=Use drag & drop to move pages out of the navigation tree or to put them back. ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.excludedPages.empty=None ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.topLevelExtensionPages=Top Level Extension Pages ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.otherPages=Other Pages ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.saveComment=Updated the Navigation Panel configuration from the Administration
